name: Drag Dodge
description:
In "Drag Dodge", you play as a booger named randy, who is being tested on in a facility, and fell into a big hole. the hole is near infinite, but with no other option, randy  must try to survive the obstacles for as long as he can.

------------------------------------------------------------------

there are many different obstacles to avoid, most of them being incredibly difficutly. the farthest ive' gotten so far (at the time of release) is only 1,000 meters! think you can do better? try the game and see for yourself!
